select g.id , g.name , g.blurb, g.first_drawing , g.swiper_images , g.detail , g.inventory , ifnull(br.num , 1) as browse , s.sellCount as sell
, if(uc.member_id , 1, 0) as collect
from bu_good g
left join (select member_id , good_id from bu_good_member_collect uc where member_id = #{memberId}) uc on g.id = uc.good_id
left join bu_good_browse br on g.id = br.good_id left join ( select count(1) as sellCount , i.good_id from bu_member_order_item i inner join bu_member_order o on i.order_id = o.id where good_id = #{gid} and o.deleted = false and o.refund_status in (0, 3) and o.status = 4 ) s on g.id = s.good_id where g.id = #{gid}
